text: Donald Louis Evans (born July 27, 1946) is an American businessman and politician. He was the 34th U.S. Secretary of Commerce from 2001 to 2005 during the George W. Bush administration. He was a longtime friend of Bush and helped run his 2000 presidential campaign. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Commerce Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Houston Category:Businesspeople from Houston
title: Donald Evans
